explanation: [0-0] In a sparse grey room, a pixelated character stands next to a wooden crate. He wears a teal and aqua shirt, and a crude wooden sign hangs above the crate. Grey walls surround him.
[0-6] The character bends down and reaches to open the crate. His expression is focused, eyes still on the crate. He retrieves a banana and eats it, chewing thoughtfully.

[6-15] The scene then shifts to a glowing white doorway, a shadowy figure visible through the light. The character's face contorts in fear as a new pixelated character bursts through the door and charges toward the first, an angry expression on his face. This new character is dressed in all black. The first character clasps his hands together and mutters something. The view cuts to the character in black, who is still running. The view cuts back as the first character falls to his knees, still muttering. The scene cuts back to the charging character, who raises a blue sword and lunges toward the first.

[15-25] As the perspective shifts, the first character continues to pray. Then, with a gesture, he opens his eyes, cries out, and the black-clad character swings his sword. The view cuts, and the first character is now standing in front of the black-clad character, facing the camera. He swings his sword multiple times, each blow dodged by the first character. With a swift uppercut, the black-clad character's eyes close, his mouth slightly open, two tears clinging to the corners of his eyes.
